post:
Lets have some fun.

I have set aside ONE Server that the Lowendtalk Community will be 
able to **decide the monthly price** on. Guaranteed for 12 Months!



==> The **Auction starts at 1 USD/Month**.

Winner is the highest bidder at the **deadline: 14th February 20:00 CET**



==> **Who can Bid:**
LET Users registered longer than 12 Months , with at least 10 posts
(Due to Brexit and HMRC not having responded to my inquiry yet i have to exclude UK users - sorry :(  )



==> **Server Spec:**

Intel c3558 (4 Cores 4 Threads)
16 GB DDR3 ECC 
2x4TB HDD
IPMI/KVM Available

10TB Traffic @ 100mbit/s Link
1 IPv4 Address

==>Other Stuff:
Obviously the regular [TOS](https://myroot.pw/assets/doc/TOS.pdf "TOS") and [AUP](https://myroot.pw/assets/doc/AUP.pdf "AUP") apply.

There is **one additional rule**: 
This is only for the winners direct/personal use.


You can check the time at https://time.is/CET

So good luck and have fun!



EDIT: As per Nekkis warning: Min. Bid increment is 0.5 USD/Month
